page.title: 09Tourism in Tiverton area
page.content: There are lots of places in our area which tourists come to see. We notice the town gets fuller of people and cars in the summer. The main attractions are: Knightshayes - A Victorian Country House The Grand Western Canal where barge trips are offered The Museum which has got lots of old objects about life and work in Tiverton through the ages Old Blundell's School which is owned by the National Trust Tiverton Castle which is only a ruin really and has had many new parts added over the years St Peter's Church which is over 900 years old The countryside where there are lots of Farmhouse Bed and Breakfast places
